main event: Observers sighted an unidentified object that changed color from white to red, had antennas or tops, and was observed for 20 minutes.
interesting points: The flight path of the object coincided with the traffic pattern of Lubbock Municipal Airport., Observers reported the object had antennas or tops., The object appeared stationary at first but later moved across the sky., The object emitted no sound., There was no physical evidence nor photographs associated with the sighting.
